videos.description: 1H (13:22) SYR Tyus Battle made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by John Gillon.
videos.headline: Tyus Battle hits a three to give St. John's an early lead over Syracuse

videos.description: Taurean Thompson cuts to the hoop and goes hard with a nasty left-handed dunk right over the defender to cut into Syracuse's deficit.
videos.headline: Thompson throws down vicious dunk over St. John's defender

videos.description: 1H (3:31) SYR Tyler Lydon made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by John Gillon.
videos.headline: Tyler Lydon hits a three in transition to help a Syracuse comeback late in the 1st half

videos.description: St. John's makes the quick passes to break down Syracuse's 2-3 zone leaving Bashir Ahmed all alone to destroy the rim with a huge dunk for the Red Storm.
videos.headline: St. John's breaks the 2-3 zone leaving Ahmed for huge slam

videos.description: 2H (16:07) SJU Shamorie Ponds made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Malik Ellison.
videos.headline: Shamorie Ponds hits his 4th three pointer of the game to extend the Red Storm lead
A ridiculous run for St. John's includes two dunks and a three point pointer
